title: spring-data-jpa repository save exception with multiple persistence units

labels.name: area/spring
labels.description: Issues relating to the Spring integration

body:
### Describe the bug

When using multiple, non-default persistence units and saving a detached entity via the quarkus-spring-data-repository `save` method, an IllegalStateException is thrown.

### Expected behavior

The `save` should successfully persist the current state of the detached entity using the correct (non-default) persistence-unit.

### Actual behavior

The following exception is thrown:

```text
java.lang.IllegalStateException: The default datasource has not been properly configured.
See https://quarkus.io/guides/datasource#jdbc-datasource for information on how to do that.
 at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.panache.common.runtime.AbstractJpaOperations.getEntityManager(AbstractJpaOperations.java:64)
 at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.panache.common.runtime.AbstractJpaOperations.getEntityManager(AbstractJpaOperations.java:89)
 at com.example.demo.p1.DemoRepository1_c8b4c34d8e0db77ef33ab6b006a416fba4b02b90Impl.save(Unknown Source)
[...]
```

### How to Reproduce?

https://github.com/fladdimir/quarkus-test-spring-data-multiple-pus/blob/master/src/test/java/com/example/demo/QuarkusMultiplePersistenceUnitsSpringDataRepositoryTest.java#L22

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-17.0.10+7 (build 17.0.10+7, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.6.6

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 8.5

### Additional information

_No response_
